string.name: warning_requirements
string.u: If you have problems with HsKAopen-connection click hier: App requirements

resources.string:
Now you can connect to Wi-fi HsKAwlan using HsKAopen! Please register there with username: 
Username@<faculty>-wlan.hs-karlsruhe.de
and yor password 

Username examples:
abcd1234@iwi-wlan.hs-karlsruhe.de
abcd1234@eit-wlan.hs-karlsruhe.de

 Possible faculty shorthands:
 iwi, ab, eit, imm, mmt, w
